alert.note: Alert for Kay; Logan; Noble; Payne (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 10:55PM CDT until June 17 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Kay County in northern Oklahoma... Noble County in northern Oklahoma... North central Logan County in central Oklahoma... Northern Payne County in central Oklahoma... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1054 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Chilocco to 5 miles west of Mulhall, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Stillwater, Ponca City, Perry, Newkirk, Morrison, Glencoe, Kaw City, Red Rock, Marland, Orlando, Kildare, Lake Carl Blackwell, Chilocco, Kaw Lake, Lake Mcmurtry, Hardy, Quay, Sooner Lake, and Ceres. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
